public method Parser::Context::Variables::create (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in create: 16
sub create {
  my $self = shift; my $value = shift; my @extra;
  return $value if ref($value) eq 'HASH';
  ($value,@extra) = @{$value} if ref($value) eq 'ARRAY';
  if (defined($type{$value})) {
    push(@extra,(parameter => 1)) if $value eq 'Parameter';
    $value = $type{$value};
  } elsif (Value::isValue($value)) {
    $value = $value->typeRef;
  } elsif ($value =~ m/$self->{context}{pattern}{signedNumber}/) {
    $value = $type{'Real'};
  } else {
    Value::Error("Unrecognized variable type '%s'",$value);
  }
  return {type => $value, @extra};
}
public method Parser::Context::Variables::init (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in init: 10
sub init {
  my $self = shift;
  $self->{dataName} = 'variables';
  $self->{name} = 'variable';
  $self->{Name} = 'Variable';
  $self->{namePattern} = qr/[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]*/;
  $self->{tokenType} = 'var';
  $self->{precedence} = 5;
  $self->{patterns}{$self->{namePattern}} = [$self->{precedence},$self->{tokenType}];
}
public method Parser::Context::Variables::parameters (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:
click to view
# Number of lines of code in parameters: 6
sub parameters {
  my $self = shift; my @names;
  foreach my $x ($self->SUPER::names)
    {push(@names,$x) if $self->{context}{variables}{$x}{parameter}}
  return @names;
}
public method Parser::Context::Variables::type (  ) 

Undocumented Method

# Number of lines of code in type: 4
sub type {
  my $self = shift; my $x = shift;
  return $self->{context}{variables}{$x}{type};
}

public method Parser::Context::Variables::variables (  ) 

Undocumented Method

Code:

# Number of lines of code in variables: 6
sub variables {
  my $self = shift; my @names;
  foreach my $x ($self->SUPER::names)
    {push(@names,$x) unless $self->{context}{variables}{$x}{parameter}}
  return @names;
}
